text.en: This moment of the essence of mind, beyond concepts,
text.en-trans: sem kyi ngowo lo drel ké chik ma

text.en: Is the ultimate guru of natural awareness—
text.en-trans: rang rik dön gyi ngowo la ma la

text.en: Knowing that we are beyond separation or union, I pray:
text.en-trans: du drel mé pé ngang né söl dep na

text.en: Bless me so that deluded perception may be purified in the ground!
text.en-trans: trül nang zhi la dak par jin gyi lop
